section.para: Decodes a URI encoded string. See URIENCODE().; Decode "www.example.com/?page=Hello%20World": exten => 123,1,Set(foo=${URIDECODE("Hello%20World")}) ; Returns "Hello World"

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'URIDECODE' =-
[Syntax] URIDECODE(<data>)
[Synopsis] Decodes a URI-encoded string according to RFC 2396.
[Description] Not available

formalpara.title: diff output to internal help in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen: 8c8 < Decodes a URI-encoded string according to RFC 2396. --- > Decodes an URI-encoded string.
